info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:55AM MST until January 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. 4 to 6 inches expected for the Flat Tops. 4 to 8 inches for the Elkhead Mountains and Park Range. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
